battery_charging: Fast charging 30W Power Delivery 3.0 Quick Charge 4.0, 3.0 Reverse charging 10W

body_build: Glass front (Gorilla Glass 6), glass back (Gorilla Glass 3), aluminum frame
cpu: Octa-core (1x2.84 GHz Cortex-A77 & 3x2.42 GHz Cortex-A77 & 4x1.80 GHz Cortex-A55)
gps: Yes, with dual-band A-GPS, GLONASS, BDS, GALILEO, QZSS, GNSS

usb: USB Type-C 3.1 (side), USB Type-C 2.0 (bottom), accessory connector, USB On-The-Go
